website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular desk lamp showcasing supreme customization on light and color.
pros: LED light is flicker-free to help with unwanted eye strain
Users able to switch lamp between 5 different colors with 7 brightness options available
cons: Many customers wish the lamp was easier to switch off

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp you can own!
customer_reviews.text: Its a fantastic light w/ 5 color modes, 7 brightness settings. Very versatile/flexible. Whether you want dim, mid, or super bright. You won't regret getting this light. And check out my unboxing & use of it!
customer_reviews.author: Lokim23

customer_reviews.title: Great Desktop Work Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. There are others built about the same that are more expensive but I like that this one can swivel from side to side from either the light head or the base. That’s important when using it for crafts and such. I’m using it to do nails and sometimes you need the perfect light angle. I haven’t tried out the sleep mode nor have I tested how fast it charges a phone or electric device. I’ll update my review once I’ve done so.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Finn

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is truly awesome, especially for the price point. It's so adjustable and can be fully customized based on use. You can bend it, angle it, turn it, and you can adjust the the shade of lighting as well as brightness. It's clean lines and takes up minimal desk space too. I plan on ordering more for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Four

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Performance
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product since the switch controls for the light brightness on one of the 2 lamps that I bought has gone bad already (five months after purchase). The brightness control will only go up to about 3/4 brightness now. I am very concerned now about my other lamp as well since this went bad so quickly. Please note that my extreme disappointment is due to the fact that this product is an Amazon best seller in the category with a 4.8 out of 5 rating. With this rating, I would expect a better performance of the product.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Love Mine
customer_reviews.text: This desk lamp is great. It has several different lighting temperatures AND brightness options. My son does remote learning and we use this lamp to illuminate him while on a Zoom or Meet classroom session. You can turn the light to face wherever you want, its awesome. I already recommended this lamp to my sister...she bought hers in white and is also happy with her purchase. I purchased the black one.
customer_reviews.author: Shavón

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the perfect lamp - love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far. In person it looks like the photos and is as described in the manufacturer's beautiful video. It seems like the perfect lamp - especially if you read print material. I have light-sensitive eyes and the adjustable lighting seems wonderful. The lamp is sleek and easily, smoothly pivots and adjusts in multiple directions. Love it! Mine in the photo is the white (not white woodgrain).
customer_reviews.author: T & J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a piano lamp for an upright!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a decent piano lamp for quite some time. The issue I always had was that, on an upright piano, the light shines into my eyes and it’s very distracting. This light is absolutely perfect because you can angle the light away from your eyes and it hits the pages perfectly. The light can be adjusted for brightness, and is great because I don’t need to wear my reading glasses in order to see it, the music is crystal clear. This does a really perfect job, I’m so happy with this light! It looks a little bit awkward , but it really does a great job and I’m totally happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I am a nail tech and I’ve been on the search for a lamp that is bright enough, but also not in my way. It is so much better than my previous clip lamp that constantly took up arm space. These are pictures I’ve taken of my workspace and pictures I’ve taken under this lamp. So far, so great! I will update with any changes!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Study Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for studying. The different temperatures allow me to choose the perfect warmth to give my eyes a rest while studying for hours. The brightness control let's me control how much glare there is off the page. And the ability to lean it far out over my book let's me reduce the amount of shadows caused by my hand.
customer_reviews.author: HonestyIsAlwaysGood

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied!! The settings are nice and the brightness is perfect. There is a usb outlet in the back that I didn't know was there lol.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Bought for of these and couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, modern and great value. Bought these for the kids to place on their desks and they are great. The light settings are great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: One design flaw in my mind
customer_reviews.text: There are nany features I like about this lamp, but one i do not. Pros: the light color is easy to switch I like the control for brightening and dimming The 3 joint flexibility is great, better than anybother lamp i have owned. The one down side (to me) which is very subjective, is you have to hold down the power button for what feels like way too long for it to turn off. Often as I leave my office for meetings and what not I don't have the time to sit there and hold it down. Why can't it just be a single tap like the rest of the functions?
customer_reviews.author: Jason Webster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lighting for my Desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. The only space I had in my 1 bedroom apt to place a desk did not have proper lighting. I bought this lamp and now I can see perfectly. I love that I can change the light modes, adjust the brightness and it’s very easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Coral Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Lamp turned itself on.
customer_reviews.text: Very first week I got it, lamp was turning itself on. Since I was using it as a nightstand light, it woke me up three times the first night that I had it. After I accidentally left it plugged in another night and it did the same thing, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Brightness and easy to turn on and off
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very convenient for small desk space such as a laptop table. Adjusting it is very easy with a touch of your finger. I recommend using it and may order another one. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light itself is fine, but everytime it turns on
customer_reviews.text: The main problem I have with this light is the controls. The light itself is fine, but everytime it turns on, it defaults to half power (even though the readout goes to full power, then back to half). You have to then click the full power button t restore the full brightness setting. And in order to turn it off, you have to hit the power button, then wait till it decreases to the lowest setting, then hold the power button for a couple seconds. After having this for a few weeks now, it's become very frustrating each time I turn it on or off. A simple on/off toggle (like my Anker LED light) would have been much better.
customer_reviews.author: Stoph

customer_reviews.title: I was thrilled with the features.....
customer_reviews.text: Really, really enjoyed this lamp...... until it went psycho the day after the return period ran out. It began turning off and on all by itself, and changing intensity levels as it pleased. I figured the electronics were frying and was afraid it would catch on fire (and it wasn’t doing me much good anyway) so I unplugged it and dragged the old gooseneck lamp out of storage. I’m just going to buy a quality soft white LED bulb for the old lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Dogwalker

customer_reviews.title: LEDs are not replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lamp.....EXCEPT that once the LED lights die---after an estimated long life of 50k hours of use---the whole thing has to go to the landfill. I NEVER would have purchased it had I realized the bulbs were not replaceable. I don't want anyone else to make the same mistake: Our throw-away way of life is not sustainable.
customer_reviews.author: KBK

customer_reviews.title: LED does not last 50,000 hours, atleast on my desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The LED stopped working right after the 1 year warranty. It has no brightness at all, just a dim light, maybe 10 lumens output. Updated 2/16/`8\\18 I updated my review to a 3 star due to the company standing behind it's products. While I had a bad experience, I like the lamp. The company did get in touch with me and offered to replace the defective unit. With todays manufacturing and mass production, quality can never be guaranteed, having a company taking care of it's customers makes a BIG difference.
customer_reviews.author: MyReview

customer_reviews.title: ... this lamp about 5-6 months ago and initially I liked this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp about 5-6 months ago and initially I liked this lamp. Plenty bright at medium setting, dimmed well and arm motion was smooth and didn't wobble. The reason for the low score however is because after returning home from a Thanksgiving trip, with the light off the entire time, noticed that the indicator light was dead (shows red when off.) Attempted to turn on but was dead. Moved the plug to another outlet and not on an extension/surge protector and still dark so ended up in the trash. So, while the light seemed to fit what I needed, cannot endorse a light that I have to replace less than 6 months later of infrequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: It's working fine in the first month
customer_reviews.text: It's working fine in the first month, but afterward the light flickers from time to time. Sometimes turning it off and on fixed the issue temporarily but flickering comes back again...
customer_reviews.author: mebd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well package and it was simple to set-up. I love the USB port on the neck. The light is adjustable from dim to super bright. It has many color temperature modes and 10 brightness levels. You can change the light with a simple touch and slide. You need to press and hold the on/off button until the light turns off. The lamp turns, bends and swivels to a multiple of positions. I only wish I can buy a similar product with a longer neck so that the lamp sits above my 27" monitor
customer_reviews.author: Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service contacted me after seeing my review about the lamp not working. They quickly send me a replacement lamp and it has been working great ever since! Original Post: I have owned for only 3 months and it stopped working. I have used it only a few times as it’s for my sewing table. Today it flickered on and off when I first turned it on. I unplugged and replugged in all the connections and now it tries to come on but barely lights up. It’s like only one bulb in the strip of led lights will come on.
customer_reviews.author: MagFL

customer_reviews.title: it was good but not right now,,,
customer_reviews.text: i bought this one last march but this day, may, it is already out of order. i has benn happy about this lamp until it is in good condition. however, i did not imagine this is broken in two month. it is blacked out!!!!! i want anyone who is in charge of selling this lamp to change new one....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight lamp (that wouldn't overheat) to sit on top of a homemade bookshelf. This is perfect! It arrived on time (before the expected date). Packaging was perfect (they even included a fiber cloth to clean it). It works great (love the dimming settings). I would def order again (when needed for my spare room..after renovations). P.S. Their Customer Service emailed me a week after I received the package to make sure I didn't have any questions about the product = a plus in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda 📚

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like the clarity all bright now I can see my keyboard. I like the style and space saver
customer_reviews.author: Magnificent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations Originally, Off Switch Stopped Working After Three Months
customer_reviews.text: The lamp met my expectations initially. However, after light use (a few hours a week on), the touch on/off switch has begun to malfunction and the only way to turn the lamp off is to unplug it. An okay lamp that met expectation for the deal price I paid that I would rate four stars for the first few months and two start afterward since the off switch stopped functioning properly, averaging to three stars. I'd expect a lamp like this to work for a least a year or more, and this didn't as it worked properly for only three months.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Not bright.
customer_reviews.text: My overhead light sucks, as you can see in the picture. I was looking for a work light for this sewing corner of my craft room, as I need to be able to see small stitches and details. I am very disappointed in this light. This is on HIGH and it barely illuminates that corner. The work area is only directly under the light when angled shining down, with a very small diameter of illumination. Probably returning. May be a good reading light above a bed, but not a working light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: *updated* Doesn't last, circuit and wiring connectivity issues over time.
customer_reviews.text: This is an update: They reached out to me and sent me a replacement. I’m going to hold and see if the thing breaks down again before reconsidering a full 5 stars. For the time being although the response time to the original post was delayed, it was very prompt once it got started. Hoping for the best ———////—— It looks good and it's functionality was on par with what I expected until four months later when it stopped working altogether without warning. Probably some circuit and wiring quality issues. Was satisfied but now disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Work great But chose another brand
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was aesthetically pleasing (a bit more like a task light than a part of the room design). The buttons worked really well and easy to see. The light had a narrow surface area. This lamp was "bulkier" and took up more desk space than I preferred. I purchased another brand that was a tad more expensive but had a coupon and had a better quality of feel (Linkind).
customer_reviews.author: A&A Trinkets & Treasures

customer_reviews.title: Great Reading lamp for students!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp at a really good price. I bought this one because of the ability to change the lighting to make it easier on the eyes for all of my long hours spent reading and writing as I work on my doctorate. Any kind of harsh, bright light really hurts my eyes, gives me a headache, and causes strain on the eyes. This lamp works beautifully. I can turn the light up, but still mute it’s brightness. The only flaw would be how lightweight the base it is, making it necessary to put your hand on the base in order to swing the arm to light up different locations. If this one ever goes out, I’d buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend. after a while
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. after a while, about 2-3 months, the light will become a little shaky. i bought three, i used two in my office, which were heavily used, and each one has the same problem after 2 month. the one in the bedroom is working ok, but it only got used very short time each day. Sp if you are looking for a study or working lamp, keep looking...
customer_reviews.author: David P. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Quit after three months
customer_reviews.text: Unit stopped working after three months. It appears the ac to dc converter is no longer working. Amazon handles initial support for this lamp, but they were unable to assist me, and they sent me contact information for the company. Have yet to be able to get a replacement. Now my wife has to have all of the living room lights on to do her homework. Update 6 Apr 20: The company reached out to me and provided a full refund via amazon gift card. While I wish the lamp worked, I am more than satisfied with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Talononeguy

customer_reviews.title: using it 1 month, defected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on 8/13 after reading great reviews. it was working as normal as lamp should be, then noticed a week or two ago that my lamp just self adjusts brightness and turns off automatically while using. nothing is pressing the power button, everything is connected. I do not know what the problem is and I don't know where to contact for this problem. it looks like this item is no longer available and there is no section to leave a seller about this inquiry. won't buy this product again nor recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewKim

customer_reviews.title: Good Lamp, just a few improvements they could make
customer_reviews.text: I have this lamp, and wish they could make a few design changes, I use to have an old drafting lamp, it had the bulb in the middle and circular bulb on the edge, and it had the telescopic mount as well. Seeing this lamp I wish they had incorporated some sort of extension into the base, as I see several points that it could be incorporated. Overall it fits what I need, though I wish it didn't have to be right next to what I’m working on.
customer_reviews.author: Anom

customer_reviews.title: ACCESSIBLE FOR MANY HANDICAPS
customer_reviews.text: Because of the lighting options and no flicker, this is going to replace Ott Light as the go-to brand for people with low vision due to cataracts, etc. We love it so much I just ordered another for myself. Pro: I can use bluer colors of light to make myself more alert or warmer tones to help produce melatonin to help me sleep. Great if you have hand injury, arthritis or carpal tunnel syndrome because it is easily adjusted for color, on/off, and angle, requiring only a VERY light touch. Simple to use, pretty, and quite bright.
customer_reviews.author: christa landon

customer_reviews.title: Both died in 6 months, though well taken care of
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this light. I had purchased two of them for my and my husband’s nightstands. They’ve never been moved around or damaged in any way. The purchase was made February 2019, and just last week (August 2019) my husband’s light completely died. I thought maybe his had a defect, so we threw it out and just continued to use mine. Well today, still in August, my second lamp had died. I am sad and frustrated. I really liked these lights, but for both of them to die within 6 months of purchase?? That made us so sad! Update*** The seller has amazing customer care skills and has reached out to me. My replacements are on their way!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lamp for my dark corner office desk in my home. This is the best one I found and I am so happy with it. I purchased 3 others first and sent them all back, so I was not hopeful about this one. The color options are great to adjust with the changing sun throughout the day (or my mood!) It's easy adjustable, the swivel at the top makes it plenty tall enough to shine over my whole desk and oversize monitor. Sleek and doesn't take up much space. Love that it's LED. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brackeen

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Amidst the coronavirus pandemic, I’m thankful to still have a job. Like lots of folks, I’m suddenly working from home which meant I need to improve my home workspace. I needed a desk lamp, and I was drawn to this one’s design and the good reviews. I was not disappointed. If you need a desk lamp, do not hesitate; buy this one! It’s well-made, looks great, and the touch sensitive finger-slide to dim and brighten works perfectly! Tre USB charge point is icing on the cake. Perhaps the best purchase I’ve made on Amazon. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: T. Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp that folds out of the way
customer_reviews.text: I use this desk lamp when I'm looking at small detailed electronics / crafts and as a webcam light for video conferences. I like the easily adjustable brightness settings as well as the color modes. Very easy to use. When it isn't in use I can fold the light down and out of the way. It's worth noting that the light head pivots 180 degrees. It would be great if you could freely rotate it all the way around. Also you can't angle the head directly vertically but it hasn't been a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for reading but not for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is bright enough for reading, I use it Next to my screen to help me avoid the blue light. I like the warm white color during screen time. It is also a great one for reading. I don’t think this desk lamp has sleep mode. But overall it is a good reading / study lamp
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew Desk Lamps Have Come So Far?
customer_reviews.text: The last time I bought a desk lamp was probably about fifteen years ago. Back then, for the price of this, I got a base, a spirally metal bendy-neck thing, and a little tiny bulb with a tiny glass lens. Today that money will buy you 50 different light settings, a USB charger, touch controls, and a soft-diffused light panel! Amazing! Four stars because while I understand that the joints that hold it aloft vertically need to be stiff, the rotational joint is also very stiff. I can't rotate it without turning the entire lamp unless I hold the base still with one hand, and turn the joint with the other. Otherwise, I'm quite happy!
customer_reviews.author: valwiggs

customer_reviews.title: okay!
customer_reviews.text: Pros great adjustability easy to adjust brightness and modes love the different light tones Cons sorta cheap build adjustment is iffy in some positions no off switch (am i missing something here) overpriced to myself, i always ask this question.. if lost or stolen and insurance company handed me the exact money i paid, would i buy it again... in this case no

customer_reviews.title: Good Lighting,  but has design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The desk light itself is fine and works as expected, a little gimmicky running your fingers across a track to increase or decrease the light but the main issue is where the arm connects the base. The connection allows you to swivel the light left or right without moving the base. It is wobbly and feels really cheap. In fact the main support arm cannot stand straight up but has to lean a little forward to support the light. The light meets my needs but I would not order it again and really debated whether I should return it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Max Silent

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a light that can be used for specific workaround lighting, this is the light for you. The brightness is adjustable for all uses and has lots of position settings. We use it for crafting, reading, and los of other tasks. Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: M. TURNER

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: So far, one of my issues with the lamp is it misalignment when closed. Secondly, the usb charging port does not charge phones as quickly as Advertised. It took my phone over 40 mins to get up to 35% of battery charge. Not sure why this is the case, but it’s really slow. Update: Taotronics reached out to me to resolve my issues with the lamp. Thanks to their amazing customer service, I received another lamp that was worked a lot better than this did. As a result, I am updating my review to reflect this as well.
customer_reviews.author: SirTLD

customer_reviews.title: Great for zoom calls!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use to give me light from in front of me when I’m on zoom calls. Easy to turn on and off and has many settings to be able to control the brightness. The light itself is flattering and works well with my laptop camera!
customer_reviews.author: CMF

customer_reviews.title: This is our second lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is our second lamp like this. I had purchased a black one to use on my desk during Zoom sessions to add extra ambient lighting and make my camera graphics look better. It worked - so well that my son stole it away for his desk. So, I purchased a second white one for myself. This one ended up on my daughter's desk in the kitchen for her to do crafts. You can tell my family loves this lamp. The multifunctional light that changes temperature is a very nice feature, and the ease of use means my five-year-old can move around the neck and adjust the light as needed all on her own.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek, multiple light settings, worth it
customer_reviews.text: This light has been amazing. I purchased it for my son because when he was doing homework he wasn’t getting enough light. Because the light can twist he doesn’t get a shadow over his paper when he is writing. The color tones of the light are really helpful as the natural light outside changes. We don’t fold it down very often but having that option is nice and it folds up easily and is a really sturdy lamp which makes it easy to take to another room if need be. We will be purchasing a second one for my mom who does a lot of writing at a desk. This product has definitely been work every cent.
customer_reviews.author: amcayanan

customer_reviews.title: This one didn't cut the mustard
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of Taotronics products, including a different desk lamp for my office, and they perform well. I just created a home office and needed a good desk lamp. This one looked versatile. After set up it was sleek enough and bright enough. But the settings were not as intuitive as my office lamp. I was not totally sold on the finger slider brightness adjustment. But then I discovered that this has no timer. FAIL. I love that functon in my work office: I set it and decide that when the light goes off, I leave. Back it goes, exchanged for the one with the wider rectangular LED base - and which has a timer.
customer_reviews.author: JADFLY

customer_reviews.title: excellent lamps
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. Modern design. the long light and adjustable arm make it easy to provide light in a large area if needed. the controls to adjust the brightness, and the color, are touch sensitive and easy to use. I am very sensitive to light, and suffer from migraines, and these help me to adjust the light to just the right setting to keep from exacerbating my headaches. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Day 1 of use but the reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: Just received this lamp yesterday, used it at night to read and it worked really well. I changed the appearance of the light to a warm white (which is another added bonus by the way) . The warmth of the lighting can be changed. And there are settings for brightness as well, touch screen. Plus there is a USB port on the back of the lamp to charge your phone. I am buying a second lamp for my husband. You should too!
customer_reviews.author: pprasher

customer_reviews.title: Great light that doesn't take up alot of room/minimalistic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light that is also bright - I got this to use as an extra light to do my calligraphy and the brightness works well at the maximum setting. I also like how you can close the light if not needed and it will be a slim profile/not take up alot of room. My only gripe is that I wish the power cord was longer so for that I'm debating keeping it since I use it to work at my dining table. However, it is nice that it can swivel at the base and top so you have a variety of angles. Other than that, great light, and very easy to adjust the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Still shining 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: A lot of products are great out of the box and then they fail in a year. I've had this and used it every day for 2 years now and it is as good as the day I got it. I love the five color temperatures and dimming feature. For regular work, I shine it into the corner and use reflected light. When doing a video conference, I turn it to illuminate my face. I liked this lamp so much, I bought a different LED lamp from Tao Tronics to use as a piano light. So far, so good with that one as well. Absolutely no complaints about this company and its superior products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd be this excited over a lamp, but this one went above and beyond my expectations. It was a crap-ton levels of brightness and color options from soft to harsh. It also has a memory feature so when I turn it off, it goes right back to where I had it. I am using this in my home office space and I like one of the softer colors. I get both some additional light, and less of a glare from my bright screen. It has a nice, wide base and the vertical and horizontal arms swivel giving me plenty of options for getting it in just the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: asleepby9

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't so crazy about this at first. Didn't like the silver accents on the white design-- made it appear cheesy looking to me. Have grown to really appreciate the many lighting settings and the many positions this little desk lamp can be turned and twisted into. Today I hosted a webinar and used it as a *studio* light behind my Webcam. Got lots of compliments to on my lighting! This morning I ordered the floor lamp version to light up the dark corner next to my desk. Can't wait for it to arrive Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Lighting function works great - casing looks & feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The casing seems cheap - definitely the sort of thing you'd expect to see on the desk of a Jr High School kid instead of an adult / hone office - but I bought it anyway. If you can get past the aesthetic aspect - the lighting & functionality of this lamp is quite nice. Since I work from home and rarely have guests in my home office - I won't send it back because it works great, but if I'd seen it in the store first, I probably would have thought twice before making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SGC

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. USB port is awesome. Only thing that takes away from it, is that it's not very "warm". The warmest light setting is barely warm. I expected this to a degree given that it's and LCD, but I had hoped for a slightly warmer bulb. That said, it's still suitable for a bedside lamp/phone charger. I like that you can collapse the light bar down, and still get a sliver of light out of it on each side. This is nice at 6am when you're half blind. It's like the gentlest night light first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy In Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Broke, Re-Ordered, Broke Again
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and had high hopes. With the first order, the arm wouldn't stay in the upright position -- it just slowly sank. Back it went for an exchange. The second one arrived broken -- the arm was snapped off and electrical wires were dangling. Unfortunately, a family member threw out the box, so I am out $40 plus tax, a trip to UPS, some packing tape, and all the time that went into the orders and return.
customer_reviews.author: Cellonotes

customer_reviews.title: Annoyig high pitched frequency noise
customer_reviews.text: This lamp makes a high pitched frequency noise that isn't super loud, but its just loud enough for it to be extremely annoyig when I am reading and I need complete silence when reading!
customer_reviews.author: The One

customer_reviews.title: it has sleep mode, what?
customer_reviews.text: There are so many features that I didn't know about sleep mode. WTF? Anyway, I got it to add a fill light for zoom calls. The ability to color correct/add different lighting temperatures sold me on the product. It is VERY handy in the office and doubles as a desk lamp. What more could you ask for at the price? No, seriously. you really can't beat it at this price point. Design, functionality, multiple color temperatures, a light bright enough to compete with daylight coming in from the window, SLEEP MODE (a bonus), adjustable brightness. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brightness levels and hues
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I purchased this lamp 3-years ago. Yeah, 3-years ago! You’re probably wondering, “wow, why take that long to review?!” Well I forgot to do it but here I am. This lamp has been with me through my last 3 years of college. It saw me struggling, angry, and frustrated through all my assignments but I knew, the lamp was leading me to a brighter future - with its unique setting to choose different brightness levels and hues. The direction of the light is highly adjustable with the hinge and base being able to rotate. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Only 510 umens
customer_reviews.text: The lamp seems well built, looks nice, and has nice features. But be aware that it is only 510 lumens (tech specs say 410). This is barely brighter than a 40 watt incandescent bulb (450 lumens) and much dimmer than a 60 watt incandescent bulb (800 lumens). I use this in my office and consider it barely adequate. I may be returning it. Unfortunately, I did not read the tech specs well enough. However, I do think the description implies a brighter light by saying it is 12 watts (12 watt LED is equivalent to a 100 watt incandescent).
customer_reviews.author: Larry Utter

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: So versatile ....I was looking for a touch lamp and this filled the bill...it’s not officially a touch but it works the same...I love that it can be LED or a regular lamp...some here have complained about having to hold the power down until it powers off but it is NOT a problem at all so this baffles me....so many settings...so many choices....I love it...I did take the advice from one reviewer and looked for the protective blue coating strip ...I removed it....apparently he didn’t and the lamp acted funny not wanting to turn on...so I’m good to go thanks to him....😊
customer_reviews.author: Lynda J. Labine

customer_reviews.title: Lighting is Everything in a Zoom Meeting
customer_reviews.text: Covid shifted my workplace from the office to the home, where I have a lovely window. It catches all the morning sun. It also makes me look like a witness protection person on Zoom, grayed out to protect my identity. I chose this lamp because it can flex at several points, allowing me to illuminate my lovely face. Or, if it's Monday, my grumpy face. No matter. Thanks to this lamp, people can see me! The feature to change the warmth of the light along with the relative brightness is helpful to preserve some semblance of natural skin tone, too. Be seen, baby!
customer_reviews.author: Erzsebet Carmean

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp - a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I just now got the lamp, so I have no long term experience with it. Having said that, it's a great desk lamp. I have more stuff on my home work desk than I want to admit to. This lamp is narrow and easy to position just where you want it. The touch panel control is very convenient, and easy to use. Just touch and immediately increase or decrease the brightness. Plus - it has a nifty color controller. Touch that, and you can go from a cool blue light to warm golden red. Add in the USB charger port, and it's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT customer service, Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: My Husband accidentally gave away my last lamp (???!!?!!) so we purchased another lol My past experience with TaoTronics proved to me that their customer service was EXCELLENT, so instead of purchasing a similar lamp from a different brand, I kept with Taotronics. The last interaction I had with TaoTronics customer service really touched me because they went out of their way to help me. This made me really respect their brand. Anyways, that paired with the quality of their lamp ( i bought a humidifier from them too which is great) I have to say I am a loyal customer now!
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous Magic World

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for Miniature Painting
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to painting minis, so I was looking for something cheap, with great lighting, and would give me enough light to see every detail. I bought this on a recommendation from a painter I follow. Purchasing this, I got so much more. It's lightweight, includes a USB port to charge a phone or other device, and it has 3 lamp modes so the light can be shifted. It's durable, and though the height isn't adjustable, it is otherwise fairly adjustable for my needs. Overall, great quality, great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: LET THERE BE LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A lamp that gives off actual light. And there are so many choices of brightness too! Love love love. The lamp's base is round and does not take up much room. Can easily be moved under a monitor screen when not in use. I keep my light folded down when done. It is an easy flip up to use and the top can be angled so there is no glare on my screen. On nights I work late, I use the softer lighter- meaning the yellowish lighting. Otherwise, I love the white daylight setting. Very soft on my sensitive eyes! With the money.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Lady

customer_reviews.title: i don't know what sleep mode is
customer_reviews.text: this light is fantastic. it's so lightweight and stays out of the way. barely takes up room on my nightstand. i love the different levels of light i can use. i like to dim it and use it to read while my husband sleeps, it doesn't bother him at all. i'm so glad i bought this, it was worth the price. i'm not sure what the sleep mode is that is on the "rate features"
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this lamp in white for use on my crafting/sewing table, but after getting it, I want another one for my computer desk. This lamp is just awesome. The brightness/color settings are excellent and will come in handy when I am working on various projects. One of my favorite features is how you can bend and tilt the arm at various angles to direct the light exactly where you need it to be. I love the design of it as well; it fits my modern decor perfectly. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chanellie

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is perfect for my bedside desk. The brightness is easy to change with the touch of the finger or you can turn it off with one touch also. The lamp has many positions and has a small footprint. The charging plugs is a bonus... now I don't have to crawl under the desk to plug in my phone. I plan to use this for doing artwork as the light can be changed to white or daylight modes (in addition to other modes). This would be perfect for a student too. I bought the white woodgrain and it's very nice. Hard to tell from the pictures how nice it really is.
customer_reviews.author: RDCprc

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lamp for my desk since zoom university is now a thing. Here are some pros and cons: Pros: -super lightweight/ portable (could place easily in a backpack and carry around) - multiple colors and brightness - bending joints make it easy to maneuver around (good for like book reading) - electrical USB port in the back (more useful then you think) - Aesthetically pleasing Cons: - the brightness in my opinion isn't as bright as your traditional light bulbs - If you have a big desk I recommend getting two, doesn't cover too much surface area Overall pretty reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Santos

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my son
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pre-teen. This light is functional as well appealing. I was worried at first that my son wouldn't want to use it, because the idea of protecting his eye sight hadn't been important to him. To my pleasant surprise, he found this lamp "so cool" that he's been using it everyday, whether he's doing homework or simply on a tablet reading. His friends all found it fascinating as well. When they visited, they would spent a lot of time on trying out all the settings. We got a lot of "where did you get this?" from his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and aesthetically looks nice on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use during my virtual meetings because I have a window behind me that makes me appear as a silhouette in video conferences. It looks very modern and the multi settings are great! However, I literally have to be sitting almost directly under it with the light turned to face me to get good even lighting on my face. If I don't have it close to my face then I still appear really dark. Not this product's fault though, my window in the back ruins it. Lighting is perfect though when pass the peak sunlight of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tria Vang

customer_reviews.title: Bedside Lamp Too
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp for the price. I’m using it as a bedside lamp for reading. I like the touch-slide feature for brightening or dimming the light based on need. I also like the button to change the color from a soft yellow to almost a daylight hue. Another upscale feature is that when you push the end of the touch-slide to turn it off, it slowly and quietly turns it off. Same thing when you turn it on in the middle of the night; no click or harsh light. I purchased the white wood grain, but I would've been just as happy with the solid white.
customer_reviews.author: Jbee

customer_reviews.title: [EDITED] Lamp is fine, but doesn't work with smart plugs
customer_reviews.text: Didn't meet my needs, the lamp will not turn on without actively pressing the power button after plugging in. Other than that, it's fine. Edit: I received an email from the seller offering me a refund, which I accepted. I have added one star to the review to reflect their generosity. I would still suggest that potential buyers think about their usecase for this lamp (e.g. are they willing to put in that extra step of turning it on even after the plug is on?) before making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good to be wrong
customer_reviews.text: I expected all the five star reviews to be a bit of a fluke. It was a pleasant surprise to realize that the five star rating was well deserved. This lamp is heavy for it's size reducing the likelihood of being knocked over, sturdy in that the arm stays where you put it, and versatile with the combination of light temperature and wide range of dimming choices.
customer_reviews.author: Southern VetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: It is handy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my child's desk for studying. Very nice, light lamp. The stand is pretty configurable and you can angle the light a variety of ways. The base includes a USB charging port, and also controls to modify the brightness and the warmth of the light color. It's not really meant to be portable but we have found that being light it is easy to move to other rooms for use when we need it in other places. It also runs relatively cool (doesn't get warm enough to be noticeable except by direct touch and it's not hot, it won't burn you). Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for local lighting of space-restricted work area
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for just over a year now. Glad I got it. Originally purchased when I was sharing an office with a fellow who didn't like the overhead fluorescents. Recently used at home during the apocalypse. Cramped space on the kitchen table with not great lighting for work purposes. The swivel options of the lamp are great for being able to have the item out of the way but still throwing light where needed. Also like the option to control the light color and the extra USB port for device charging.
customer_reviews.author: E. Maggini

customer_reviews.title: Incredible lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this lamp to be good, but it’s much better than good! The way you turn the lights from high to low or to off is touch control so that’s handy. The gradual degree of the light is perfect, you’ll find the setting you need each time you sit down. It’s got the USB feature which is handy. The light section is adjustable to again, meet your immediate need and it’s pretty compact so it doesn’t take up very much desk space. I’m very pleased with it! Don’t hesitate any longer!
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This lamp has it all
customer_reviews.text: After a frustrating experience (DOA after 2 months) with a big box store LED lamp, and a replacement, I found this item on Amazon. It has all the features I liked about the other one -- dim to bright light, USB power outlet for my phone charger, and a head that can be moved in two dimensions. Of course, its only been in service for a week but based on other reviews I've read here, I don't think I will be disappointed. If so, I will update here. As always, your results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: mr_zeeno

customer_reviews.title: Perfect adjustable light desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lamp. It lights up my sewing area perfectly. I especially like the light level options. I can set it to bright daylight or as low as a night light. It is easy to use. All you do is touch the dot on the base to select your favorite light level. I'm going to order another for my husband's desk.
customer_reviews.author: M. ShellTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Great for a nightstand or desk
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these lamps now, that's how great they are! Two for either side of the bed - the warmest, dimmest setting is perfect for a nightstand. One for my home office and another for the kid's craft table - both are adjusted often depending on the activity being done at the time. The two older versions I have (purchased in Oct 2017) would randomly turn when I first purchased them, but they haven't done it in 6+ months now, and no issues with the two newer ones (purchased in Jan 2020).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not for phones with cameras that stick out on the back
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very bright and I love the different levels of brightness. I love the adjustable arm. BUT it does not charge anything! The camera on my phone sticks out and the base is wide so it will not line up to charge. I tried my wireless earbuds that charge in their case and even they don't charge, so their is a problem with it. The whole reason I bought this one was to save space on my desk, and keep my phone charged. I will be returning it once I find a suitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Lacy

customer_reviews.title: perfect lighting for WFH desks
customer_reviews.text: Since being in lockdown for foreseeable future, I had a need for a desk lamp that also could help with web conferencing lighting. This lamp does not disappoint. I love the lighting options and doesn't take up much real estate on my desk. The arm is easy to adjust. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is the USB port doesn't work. I tried two of my iOS cables and neither will charge. I chose not to pursue troubleshooting as that feature wasn't a must-have for me. Great for a home office or dorm.
customer_reviews.author: S. Desai

customer_reviews.title: Glare on pages
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this item again because of the glare it has on the pages. It seems I cannot adjust the light in a way that the glare on the pages is eliminated. It is difficult to read due to the glare so I am not sure how I am going to use it. The USB port does work, just make sure you have it in far enough. Update: Now that I have had some time to figure out how to work with the glare from the lamp, I find it is more helpful than I thought. I really do like the USP port and the ability to adjust the light. I would probably purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: This lamp SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I've now put up with this miserable lamp for just under a year. --- I am finally dumping this in the trash! Don't want to inflict misery into someone else's life by leaving it with Goodwill. -------Nearly every time I try to turn it OFF, I have to press down hard... or soft... or for 5 seconds... or LONGER on the OFF button! --- And sometimes even THAT doesn't turn the thing off. Trust me, this is a serious flaw in the design. --- If you purchase this lamp, I can tell you for sure that you will be sooooo sorry. It looks good.... but it SUCKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael byrne

customer_reviews.title: Taotronics LED Desk Lamp Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: I like to read and often do so before bed. Older tungsten lighting isn't sufficient and probably not good for eyes or wise energy use, so this Taotronics LED reading lamp is a useful and wonderful way to get better lighting. No longer have to squint or put up with dim edges on my books. The lighting is even and can be adjusted for different temperature/coloration. Love this lamp. Will probably order again as a gift to others.
customer_reviews.author: EarthPlanner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I added this as second lamp as I have another lamp by they same company. I love there products. I have a total of 4 desk lamps 2 at home and 2 at work. This model is on the lower level as it is plastic the others are Stainless steel. Overall it is very well built and the controls are easy to use. It you want a low cost bright LED lamp get this one. It is the same price or less than the cheap ones at walmart with out a bulb. I would buy this again as this company has great products
customer_reviews.author: john coffman

customer_reviews.title: Light color adustable
customer_reviews.text: I have several LED lamps, overhead lamps for the garage, etc but the light intensity is sometimes too brilliant. This lamp not only gives you the ability to vary the intensity of the light, but you can also change the "color" or frequency of the emitted light. There are 5 settings for color, from brilliant white light to a pleasing amber color, somewhat like a low wattage incandescent bulb. I also like the USB charging port to charge my phone on the nightstand overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Gee

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this lamp and couldn't wait to try it out. The reviews did not fail me. This is one of the best home office purchases I've made since working from home. The different light settings are useful for all work environments. I had a problem with my old desk lamp causing a glare while on Zoom so I'd have to turn it off but I can leave this one on in the background with no issues. The quality looks to be sturdy and should last me a few years or until LED light goes out. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: EchoS

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this light! I do adult coloring and I could never get the right light to work by. Did a lot of research and decided on this one. It's plastic but very sturdy and doesn't tip over very easily. Multiple settings, positions, swivel, bends way down to the surface of the workspace, and doesn't take up a lot of room for my needs. I got the white one and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: CP.

customer_reviews.title: it looks exactly as it is shown
customer_reviews.text: Simple, multi-functional, and easy nice looking. I personally have the white ones, both the one with a wooden texture and the pure plastic one. It doesn't really make a big difference, the more expansive can be more fitting to your other furniture. You can change the brightness with one touch, you can also charge your phone nearby, and you can have five different colors of the white-light! It turns 90 degrees left and right, enough for a desk (and it, of course, turns other ways as well, explore for yourself), and it is bright enough, so don't worry.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I have numerous choices of light and brightness. It swivels at the base and at the top so I can point the light where I need it. I read in bed at night and it's perfect because I can point the light at the book. During the day, if I need a light, I can have a very subtle light rather than a blaring light bulb. It has a USB port for charging and I can charge either my phone or Kindle right at the bedside. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ssc1943

customer_reviews.title: Very Adjustable, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was able to make this lamp work in a very challenging space thanks to it having multiple tilt options and even a swivel at the base. Love the warm/cold light adjust, there variable brightness, and the memory feature. Bought this to help with video call quality since I’m doing a lot of teleworking these days. Have been able to test it out and am very pleased. 4 stars just because there doesn’t appear to be a way to replace the bulb, so when it dies I guess I buy a new lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Lets Go Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Customer service came thru and stood behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: Really want to like this lamp but one of the slide dimmer buttons burned out. I contacted Amazon who washed their hands of it after 3 months. The MFG wants me to return it before they will send out replacement leaving me with no lamp whatsoever. For $40 that is not how I should be treated. Will not buy Tao Tronics products, there are equal products out there with more lumens and a better return / warranty policy. Update: they are sending a replacement as requested! Yes, this is how it’s done!
customer_reviews.author: gina cohan

customer_reviews.title: I was lookin' for light in all the wrong places...
customer_reviews.text: ...but this TaoTronics table lamp is exactly what i didn't realize I was looking for. Sleek, minimalist look, takes up very little space on desk or nightstand, very bright and easily dimmable. Versatile. Light weight but sturdy. It comes in a variety of colors but I chose the black. I paid around $45.00 altogether and I think it will serve me well for a long time. I'm planning to peruse the TaoTronics catalog for another lamp or two; I'd never heard of them before I found this lamp, but I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Catabolist

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy a desktop lamp from Amazon, but I am not disappointed in my purchase. I needed to buy a lamp since I am an online student this semester, due to Covid. When I stay up late at night, which is every night now, this lamp works beyond my expectations. The only suggestion I recommend, when you’re done using the lamp, don’t close it all of the way. Leave it open so it can cool off. If you put it down, all of the heat is stuck and it will cause damage. I love the different settings you can change it to. It’s a great price for all that you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coffer

customer_reviews.title: Much better then my normal desk lap (updated)
customer_reviews.text: Living in Alaska, our winters are very dark, even with a light in the room, it doesn't lighten up my desk area very well. I bought this lamp do to the many reviews and this is probably one of the best items I bought in ages. I like how it covers the area I need and the adjustments for dim to brightness. Only thing I don't care about, and its only because of personal preference...the base is a little large, 7 inch. It takes up a bit of space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: msthamara
